content.query:
USE updatawarehouse
GO

CREATE SCHEMA business AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

--Transacional con particion
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.base02(
    UPC VARCHAR(8000),
    SKU VARCHAR(8000)
) WITH (
    LOCATION = '/raw/raw_lab02/base.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
);
GO

-- STOCK
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.stock(
    COD_REF VARCHAR(8000),
    STOCK_CONTABLE VARCHAR(8000),
    PREC_UNITARIO VARCHAR(8000),
    PU_CONTABLE VARCHAR(8000)
) WITH (
    LOCATION = '/raw/raw_lab02/stock.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
);
GO

-- PRECIO
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.precio(
    COD_REF VARCHAR(8000),
    PREC_UNITARIO VARCHAR(8000)
) WITH (
    LOCATION = '/raw/raw_lab02/precio.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
);
GO

-- UNIDADES
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.unidades01(
    COD_REF VARCHAR(8000),
    UPC VARCHAR(8000),
    SKU VARCHAR(8000),
    DESCRIPCION_LARGA VARCHAR(8000),
    SUBCLASE_CONJUNTO VARCHAR(8000),
    DESC_SUBCLASE_DESC_CONJUNTO VARCHAR(8000),
    MARCA VARCHAR(8000),
    MODELO VARCHAR(8000),
    NRO_LOCAL VARCHAR(8000),
    LOCAL VARCHAR(8000),
    Unidades VARCHAR(8000),
    Fecha VARCHAR(8000)
) WITH (
    LOCATION = '/raw/raw_lab02/unidades.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
);
GO


-- TiendasRetail
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.TiendasRetail(
    SolicitanteCodigo VARCHAR(8000),
    Descripcion_SolicitanteCodigo VARCHAR(8000),
    COD_LOCAL VARCHAR(8000),
    DESCRIPCION_LOCAL VARCHAR(8000),
    DISTRITO VARCHAR(8000),
    DEPARTAMENTO VARCHAR(8000),
    PROVINCIA VARCHAR(8000),
    RETAIL VARCHAR(8000)
) WITH (
    LOCATION = '/raw/raw_lab02/TiendasRetail.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
);
GO


-- ProductosRetail
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.ProductosRetail(
    SKU VARCHAR(8000),
    VC_codigo_material VARCHAR(8000),
    RETAIL VARCHAR(8000),
    VC_descripcion_material VARCHAR(8000),
    VC_grupo_material_2 VARCHAR(8000),
    categ_1 VARCHAR(8000),
    categ_2 VARCHAR(8000)
) WITH (
    LOCATION = '/raw/raw_lab02/ProductosRetail.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
);
GO


-- MaestreoMateriales
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.MaestroMateriales(
    VC_codigo_material VARCHAR(8000),
    VC_descripcion_material VARCHAR(8000),
    Cod_Grupo_material_2 VARCHAR(8000),
    VC_grupo_material_2 VARCHAR(8000),
    categ_1 VARCHAR(8000),
    categ_2 VARCHAR(8000),
    NPIs VARCHAR(8000)
) WITH (
    LOCATION = '/raw/raw_lab02/MaestroMateriales.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
);
GO

SELECT * FROM business.stock
